algorithm_technique: Iterate through all possible triplets (u, v, w) and check for triangle formation and calculate degree.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum degree of a connected trio (triangle) in a graph.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through all nodes and their neighbors to find triangles, calculating trio degree by summing node degrees minus 6.
key_insights: A connected trio is a clique of size 3 (a triangle).
The degree of a trio is the sum of degrees of its nodes minus the edges within the trio (6).
The adjacency list should store neighbors efficiently for quick lookups.
